action.name: Hug
entries: When you take the Hug action, you use at least one free hand to embrace a willing creature in a comforting hug. If that creature is {@condition frightened}, and the cause of that condition allows them to make a saving throw to end the effect, that creature may use their reaction to attempt a saving throw.
This saving throw attempt does not count against any limit on attempts.
Once a creature has been {@condition hugged|zorq}, that creature cannot benefit again from the effect of a Hug while the cause of their {@condition frightened} condition remains the same.

items: A creature who is hugged is much happier than they would be if they were not being hugged.
The condition ends if the hugger is {@condition incapacitated}.
The condition also ends if an effect removes the hugged creature from the reach of the hugger or hugging effect, such as when a creature is hurled away by the {@spell thunderwave} spell.
